channel.title: Emulous / Project Insanity - Item Amounts
channel.description:
Hey Mopar,
Well I think most of you have realized that in Project Insanity and Emulous the colours of the amount if items is weird and wrong.
Yellow = It isn't the normal yellows, it's like it's been customly added. White = It is not the proper white RuneScape has. Green = It is light and looks like crap.
How can I add the proper colours of the money?
Thanks. :)
